title: Sage Organic Vegan Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Mexican
description: Vegan food restaurant serving daily lunch and dinner plus weekend brunch. The only non-vegan item is honey, which is used in ice cream, labeled. On the menu are American comfort food dishes and Mexican plates like tacos and enchiladas. Causal decor with large windows and shares the same space as KindKreme raw ice cream shop. Originally opened in 2011 by owners of Millie's restaurant and bought by KindKreme in 2012.
